title: Get Started with cmapr
text: cmapr modern R package tidy, reproducible analysis CMap Career Mobility Dataset‚Äîlargest open research dataset global career transitions, created study ‚Äúglobal career mobility map 170 million job transitions‚Äù published Scientific Data (Nature). CMap dataset provides anonymized, aggregated records 170 million real-world job transitions across countries, sectors, job titles. includes standardized mappings job titles, sector regional labels, specialization indices, directed promotion networks, enabling powerful labor market research modeling. cmapr makes easy access, manipulate, analyze data using tidyverse ecosystem.

title: Tools for Career Mobility Analysis with the CMap Dataset
text: cmapr R package reproducible analysis CMap Career Mobility Dataset, global database standardized job titles, specialization scores, career transitions across 24 sectors. package provides tidy interface accessing, manipulating, exploring career mobility data‚Äîincluding job title mappings, specialization metrics, validated model-inferred promotion networks‚Äîenabling large-scale labor market analysis, workforce research, mobility modeling.

title: Tools for Career Mobility Analysis with the CMap Dataset
text: Standardized Title Taxonomy Access multi-level title hierarchy based 5.2 million job titles 220+ million public CVs. Titles cleaned, generalized, simplified across 24 industry sectors using NLP LLM-assisted methods. Specialization Index (SI) Evaluate concentrated job title within sector using normalized specialization score (0 1). High SI values denote strong occupational identity niche expertise. Promotion Networks Explore two types directed career transition graphs: ‚ñ∏ Validated: ~32,000 human-annotated promotions (U.S. U.K.) ‚ñ∏ Unvalidated: ~61,000 model-inferred transitions ~10 million CVs (global) Graphs include edge weights, validation status, optional interactive HTML views. Tidyverse-First API functions return tibble objects lists tibbles, designed work fluidly dplyr, tidyr, ggplot2, broader tidyverse ecosystem. Built-Downloaders & Utilities Automatically download unzip latest official release Zenodo, functions load structured files, parse career transitions, join metadata.

title: Tools for Career Mobility Analysis with the CMap Dataset
text: CMap dataset constructed aggregating 546 million job experiences 220+ million publicly available CVs, covering 197 countries 24 sectors (e.g., health, finance, manufacturing). Job titles cleaned standardized ~123,000 unique entries using large language models multi-stage NLP pipelines. Specialization Index (SI): numerical indicator (0‚Äì1) quantifying sector-specific job title . Higher values indicate narrower occupational focus. Career Mobility Data:
code: -   \~32k human-labeled promotions (U.S. and U.K.)  -   \~61k statistically inferred transitions using a model trained on validated pairs  -   Model performance: **97.5% balanced accuracy**, **98.9% precision**, **99.2% recall**

Main columns include: job_title_from Source job title transition. job_title_to Destination job title transition. transition_count Number observed transitions job titles. job_count_in_sector Count job appearances within sector specialization. transition_weighted_count Weighted normalized count job--job transitions. job_weighted_count_in_sector Weighted count job title occurrences sector index. promotion_probability Estimated probability promotion transition (0 1). region Region transition occurred. sector Sector code name. validated Indicator whether transition validated. si_from Specialization Index source job. se_from Sector Exclusivity source job. sd_from Sector Dominance source job. weighted_freq_from Weighted frequency source job. si_to Specialization Index destination job. se_to Sector Exclusivity destination job. sd_to Sector Dominance destination job. weighted_freq_to Weighted frequency destination job. si_difference Change specialization index (destination - source). sd_difference Change sector dominance (destination - source). popularity_difference Change weighted frequency (destination - source). education_progression_score Score educational progression. job_start_score Score starting new job. upward_mobility Binary indicator upward mobility (high promotion probability). career_stagnation Binary indicator career stagnation (low promotion probability). job_hopping_potential Binary indicator transition suggests high job hopping. source_file File path source data.
